DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Participant Responses Educational Counseling About Different Combined Hormonal Contraceptive Choices ( P06557 )
DOC.criteria: Healthy woman ≥ 18 year age ≤ 40 year age consult physician contraception would consider combined hormonal contraceptive method Women use hormonal method first time previously use suspend least 1 month Women one combine pill would consider switch another combine pill ( Women attend physician stop one combine hormonal method participate ) Women request combine hormonal contraceptive method physician considers another method appropriate ( e.g . contraindication combine hormonal contraception ) counsel method still complete questionnaire Women interest become pregnant next 4 month Women agree complete questionnaire questionnaire data review analyzed staff participate project
